name: CyberNoire
description:
CyberNoire is a detective horror game with FPS elements set on a dystopian version of our future.

The character we control (Agent Kane Anderson) is a policeman from “Neo City” in the year 2082  who is assigned the investigation of a murder case in the mansion of a very important macro corporation member (Tyrell Vega, CEO of VEGA CORP).

The society is in a state of maximum inequality, with a lot of delinquency in the streets, and is mostly controlled by the richest.

The game begins when we fly to the abandoned house, on a dark and rainy night...

Keyboard Controller

Website: finigam.es

Twitter: @GamesFini

YouTube: @FiniGames

Feel free to leave us feedback below in the comments, we will respond to them and release a new version of the game with all your recommendations and improvements.

Sharing and donating will be appreciated and will help us improve the game even more.
